import React from 'react'; import cImage from "../robot.png"; const Projects = () => { return (

Projects

Data Analysis

Language : C

Usefull functions for data analysis and statistics purposes. The functions are designed to analyzing datasets organized as columns and can calculate various statistics, such as mean, minimum, maximum, standard deviation, median, quartiles, and can also remove extreme values.

Autonomous robot project

Language : Embedded C

Autonomous object-finder robot project. The robot is powered by a PIC18 microcontroller, and is equipped with a sonar sensor to detect its surroundings, and two tracks to move.

Predictive text recognition

Language : C, css

Human-machine interface (GTK) that provides suggestions based on incomplete user input. The most frequent words are priorized as suggestions. The user has the option to manually add new words.

Iris Petal Color Classifier

Language : Python

Concise neural network project leveraging the well-known Iris flower dataset. Focused on determining flower color from petal dimensions, this model employs a basic architecture for easy understanding of the fundamentals of neural networks.

Multithreaded file hosting server

Language : C

The server and client communicate over a network connection to perform actions like listing, downloading, uploading and deleting files. The server is handled in a multithreaded manner and can handle multiple clients at the same time.

Autonomous robot project

John Doe

Architect & Engineer

We love that guy

); }; export default Projects;
